name: DPad Dungeon
description:
In DPad Dungeon,  you are the controller. In this bullet-hell rogue-like, dodge electrical equipment and collect button powerups to stay alive, in a dungeon where taking damage causes you to lose control. . .(literally).

Explore over one level in this epic saga. Try for the high score!

Made by Max Lama, Max Mitchell, and Conor Toland for GMTK Summer Game Jam 2020.
